TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {85988=The execution of the foregoing papers writing was this the 29th May 1880, duly proved before me, by the oath and examination of J. B. Little and Q. M. Smith subscribing witnep (witness) thereto, therefore let said will & certificate be recorded. M. O. Sherrill Judge of Probate, 40710=1860 Catawba County Census, 1294=Lewis Carlan Goble was born on 28 Apr 1813 in the Catawba River Area, Lincoln/Catawba County, NC.  His parents were Corban Goble and Elizabeth Robinson. Lewis married Evi Hefner on 30 Jun 1839 in Lincoln/Catawba County.  Evi was born in 1813.  She was the daughter of John Hefner and Elizabeth Wallace., 55765=1860 Catawba County Agricultural Census, 64377=1870 Catawba County Census, 12463=1850 Catawba County Census, 31564=1850 Catawba County Agricultural Census, 81777=Last Will & Testament, 1880, 2801=1840 Census, 89853=1880 Catawba County Census, 893=Born: 28 Apr 1813, Lincoln County, NC Died:  May 1880, Catawba County, NC, 84961=And lastly I do hereby constitute and appoint my son Emanuel Goble my lawful executor to all intents and purposes to execute this my Last Will and Testament according to the true intent and meaning of the same, hereby revoking and declaring utterly void all other Wills & Testaments by me heretofore made in witnep (witness) whereof I the said Lewis Goble do hereunto set my hand seal this 12th day of March 1880.}
